page.title: 04OLD BARN STORES
page.content: A lady and her husband own the stores.They have a relation who works part time.The Post Office is part of the stores.They have about a hundred customers a day.They have a nuclear warning system in the stores.They start work at 5:30am when the groceries and bread are delivered.At 12.00pm the school children come in to buy their lunches.The shopkeepers have their lunch break from 12:30pm to 1:45pm.They close at 6:00pm.In the evening they go to the whole salers. SOMERSHAM POTTERY The potter is self employed,he enjoys his work.He has been a potter since 1979.In his studio are four pottery wheels.The clay that he uses costs five pounds a bag and it comes from Stoke-on -Trent.He makes many pots,he also makes sculptures.In the school holidays he gives pottery lessons to the children.
